casebody.data:
No. 11-434. Stewart Mortensen, Petitioner v. Robert A. Brown, et al. 565 U.S. 1100, 132 S. Ct. 847,

181 L. Ed. 2d 563,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8991. December 12, 2011.

Motion of ACA International for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of California denied.

Same case below, 51 Cal. 4th 1052, 126 Cal. Rptr. 3d 428, 253 P.3d 522.
